meanings.sent1: The unfashionables clothes were old-fashioned and not cool.
meanings.sent2: She refused to wear the unfashionables outfit to the party.
meanings.sent3: Even the unfashionables sweater couldn't hide her bright smile.
meanings.sent4: His unfashionables haircut made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The unfashionables shoes were as noticeable as a neon sign.

meanings.definition: People or things that are out of fashion
meanings.sent1: The unfashionables were left untouched on the clearance rack.
meanings.sent2: She felt like one of the unfashionables in her vintage dress.
meanings.sent3: The unfashionables at the thrift store seemed to have stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, the unfashionables were often overlooked.
meanings.sent5: He stood out among the crowd of stylish people, a true unfashionables.
